title: StandBy is a new iPhone feature that could be great for Apple Home users #shorts
description: Apple has announced StandBy  a new feature that turns the iPhone into a sort of smart display when its docked on its side. The company announced this new trick onstage at WWDC 2023 while debuting iOS 17, which is expected to arrive this fall. transcript: Your iPhone is about to learn a new trick: StandBy mode. It's coming with iOS 17, and it basically turns your iPhone into a little bedside clock. All you have to do is start charging your phone and turn it sideways. You can pick from a few different clock faces, or have it show your photos. There's even a calendar view with widgets. Google offers some similar features for its Pixel phones, but you need to use their wireless charger in order for them to work. The thing I love about StandBy mode is that it works with any charger. Look out for StandBy mode coming this fall to your iPhone in iOS 17.
